page.title: 04Farmlife,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: Claire Jones lives on the 160 acre Pant Farm, Hope Mountain with her parents,her older brother Philip,her older sister Sharon and her younger sisters Sarah and Elizabeth. Her parents have to get up very early and usually work very hard.On week-ends and holidays the children help out grooming and milking the goats,tending to the horses and feeding the sheep and calves.They often have little time to play. Lambing is the worst time on the farm especially if the weather is bad and foxes are busy killing the lambs.But the family still enjoy life and there are many times when they have good fun.They find the landscape is usually interesting in all seasons.
